translations: n.警察；管纱，纬管；<爱尔兰>精明，明智
v.抓获，逮捕；遭受，蒙受；收到，得到；表明，摆出；偷，盗窃；<非正式>失败，送命（cop out）

phrs.translation: [美俚]逃避；放弃；自首并告密；避重就轻地认罪

sentences.sentence: He pulled out a badge and said he was a cop.
sentences.translation: 他拿出工作证，说他是警察。

sentences.sentence: Malone, a cop, felt as much an outsider as any of them.
sentences.translation: 马隆，一个警察，跟他们中任何人一样感到自己是个外人。

sentences.sentence: He's not much cop as a singer.
